item.title: About
item.description: This is the person programming blog of Tom Greenwood (who after this introductory paragraph will henceforth refer to himself in the first person). Most probably, these posts will read as a series of attempts to run before learning to walk. I will enable commenting as soon as I’ve learnt how.. It is build using the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie and then actually modified a little bit more, by me.

item.title: metaprogramming with map(quo) %>% reduce
item.description: Ever since I discovered the rlang function ‘expr’ I have become mildy obsessed with the idea of writing code which writes code (I think this falls under the banner of metaprogramming, hence the title of this post).
